textAfterTable: 12 Songs Customer Reviews The best album ever!!!           by carl - since 1990 This is one of the best rock albums ever made!!! There isn't a bad song on the album. This is a must have for any Blinside fan and is an album everyone should think seriously about buying (if you havn't already). Biography Formed: 1994 in Stockholm, Sweden Genre: Rock Years Active: '90s, '00s Having gotten their start in Stockholm, Sweden under the name "Underfree" during the first two years of their career, Marcus Dahlström (drums), Simon Grenehed (guitar), Christian Lindskog (vocals) and Tomas Naslund (bass) eventually changed their name to Blindside upon the release of their second demo in 1996. Being a regular in the Christian heavy metal scene of Sweden, Day-Glo Records eventually followed with the release of Blindside's self-titled first album in 1997. After a distribution deal...
